data.fact: Even though Luffy is the main character of One Piece, Nami appears on screen before Luffy in the anime making her first main character to be seen.
The only way Luffy will part from his crew is either if he becomes the Pirate King or if he dies.
Zoro was the first crew member recruited by Luffy. However, in early drafts Zoro was drawn as part of the Buggys crew.
One of Zoro s hobbies is flipping through picture guides of weapons and bounty heads.
One Piece was supposed to run for a maximum of 5 years but Oda continued the series on because he really enjoys writing it.

Eiichiro Oda spends 3 days a week writing One Pieces story. He then spends another 3 days drawing it. He barely gets time off which is kinda funny since he pursued a career in manga as he said "You dont have to get a real job
Sanji was originally supposed to be named Naruto but Oda changed it since there was a Naruto series coming out at the same time.
Dadan was originally a man. Dadan s early design showed him wearing a hat, shades and smoking a pipe.
The Strawhat crew is the only pirate crew known to have all its members with bounties on their heads.
Speed â€‹â€‹Jiru is the fastest man in the Whitebeard Pirates.
"Ax Hand" Morgan and "Iron Mace" Alvida are also names after famous pirates. Morgan is named after Henry Morgan.
Sabo is based off of Oliver Twist, from the top hat to the slightly dirty look.
Of the original Shichibukai, the 48 year old Gecko Moria is the tallest and oldest. Whereas Boa Hancock is only 29 years old.
Monkey D. Luffy is the first and only pirate in existence to ever enter and escape the top 3 government facilities.
If you pay attention to a creature called Pandaman can be seen frequently in the manga and anime.
Shanks got his 3 scars from battles with Blackbeard when he was still under Whitebeard.
Luffys favorite passtime is eating watermelons at night in the summer.
Nico Robin always carries around Choppers favorite candies.
Monet s design was based on Harpies from Greek Mythology since they were known to abduct people.
Monet is the first female character to die in the series.
Oda says that the hardest character to draw is Boa Hancock.
Boa Hancock is the only known female character to possess the Conqueror s Haki
None of the males in the Strawhats knew how to tie a tie untill they met Sanji
At age 19 Luffy is the youngest member of all 12 members of the Worst Generation.
Its said that during Zoro s fight with Mr 1 its the first instance of Zoro using observation haki.
